frame.name: OnChainCredz
frame.subtitle: Turn every event into a verifiable credential
frame.description: onChainCredz lets users claim and showcase digital badges for events like hackathons, workshops, and meetups. Each badge is tied to the userâ€™s wallet on Base Layer-2, creating a verifiable, on-chain record of participation and skills. Perfect for attendees who want to track, share, and prove their achievements instantly.
